org.corfudb.infrastructure

Class ServerContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.infrastructure.ServerContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class ServerContext
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Server Context:
    • Contains the common node level DataStore
    • Responsible for Server level EPOCH
    • Should contain common services/utilities that the different Servers in a node require.

    Note: It is created in CorfuServer and then passed to all the servers including NettyServerRouter.

    Created by mdhawan on 8/5/16.

      • installSingleNodeLayoutIfAbsent

        public boolean installSingleNodeLayoutIfAbsent()
        Install a single node layout if and only if no layout is currently installed. Synchronized, so this method is thread-safe.
        Returns:
        True, if a new layout was installed, false otherwise.

      • getNewSingleNodeLayout

        Get a new single node layout used for self-bootstrapping a server started with the -s flag.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the cluster id was not auto, base64 or a UUID string

      • setSequencerEpoch

        public void setSequencerEpoch(long sequencerEpoch)
        Persists the sequencer epoch. This is set only by the SequencerServer in the resetServer. No lock required as it relies on the resetServer lock.
        Parameters:
        sequencerEpoch - Epoch to persist.

      • getSequencerEpoch

      • close

        public void close()

        Cleans up and releases all resources (such as thread pools and files) opened by this ServerContext.
